issue.title: [R] [CI] Move r tools 35 build back to per-commit/pre-PR
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13492](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13492). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're seeing more failures here than we would like, and it's easier to diagnose when we see them during the PR process.

comments.body:
